title: Enhancing Nursing Practical Competencies: Mobile Technology-Integrated High School English Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners will use mobile applications (e.g., Duolingo) to plan and execute self-directed English learning at least three times per week.

In medical/nursing scenario-based projects (e.g., patient record writing, clinical simulation dialogues), the learner performs a 5+ minute oral presentation in English for at least three situations (emergency room, ward, outpatient clinic) and writes a 200+ word report (including diagnosis summary and treatment plan).
Learners will perform at least 80% of social interactions (e.g., providing feedback) with peer learners using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
